resources.string: CREATE TABLE down( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT not NULL, type INTEGER, singer TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, album TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, fileUrl TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, size TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, imgPath TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, mvPath TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, lrc TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, state INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE shoucang( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT not NULL, singer TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, album TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, fileUrl TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, size TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, imgPath TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, mvPath TEXT DEFAULT 暂无, lrc TEXT DEFAULT 暂无)
